content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Water Supply at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Boiler System at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0), boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0), and multiple pipes connected to the boilers

### Electricity Network
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles at positions (x=7.5, y=0.5), (x=7.5, y=-0.5), (x=7.5, y=2.5), (x=3.5, y=2.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe to transport the fluid
- Ensure the offshore pump has a valid fluid system
### Errors when using boiler
- Make sure the boiler has a valid fuel source
- Ensure the boiler is connected to a pipe to transport the steam
### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure the pipes are connected to a valid fluid system
- Ensure the pipes are not blocked by other entities
